metadata.title: CVE-2024-56575 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: imx-jpeg: Ensure power suppliers be suspended before detach themThe power suppliers are always requested to suspend asynchronously,dev_pm_domain_detach() requires the caller to ensure propersynchronization of this function with power management callbacks.otherwise the detach may led to kernel panic, like below:[
